attributes.action: Help bring H.M.S.Plymouth back to its home port of Plymouth and not let it go to the breakers Yard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign this petition to try to save ex naval boat H.M.S.Plymouth.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Help bring H.M.S.Plymouth back to its home port of Plymouth and not let it go to the breakers Yard."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20141


Prime Minister's Office
